RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: W W SPRINGTIME was away alertly, forced the pace on the turn, had the lead from the three path at the top of the stretch and prevailed. MONEY MATTERS was hustled early, had a slim lead on the turn and vied through the stretch but was second best. LETTING LOOSE was unhurried early and raced evenly on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch needed more. BRADY O'BRADY was in touch and hustled along on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. BEN LOMOND was off a step slow and saved ground on the turn but was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Ben Lomond
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, saved ground turn, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Brady O'Brady
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along turn, 5-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Money Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, vied stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Letting Loose
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, evenly turn, 6-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: W W Springtime
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, led 3-path stretch, prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 21600. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. (*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPIRIT BELLE showed speed from the outside, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was much the best. VICTORIOUS TAPIT was unhurried early, a factor on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch held place. PERFECTION SAVER was in touch and had a mild gain on the turn but leveled off in mid stretch. SLOANS SKY was in range early but trailed the field on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch had no kick. JIMMY IS A BREEZE was hustled early and roused on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Jimmy Is a Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, roused turn, 6-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Victorious Tapit
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, factor turn, 5-path stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Sloans Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, trailed turn, 5-path stretch, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Perfection Saver
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, mild gain turn, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Spirit Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, much the best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 18900. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONEYS DIAMOND was off slow, had the lead on the turn and from the three path through the stretch proved best. WHISPER ME A SONG was in touch and moved up on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. PICK A PENNY was in range and had a good position on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch finished evenly. ALWAY'S ROSIE was up close and a factor on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch weakened. CLOSING BRIEF'S was away alertly but chased on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch had nothing left. LEA'S SUNSHINE was well back and showed little in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Honeys Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, led turn, 3-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Lea's Sunshine
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Alway's Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, factor turn, 5-path stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Whisper Me a Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, moved up turn, 4-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Pick a Penny
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, good position turn, 7-path stretch, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Closing Brief's
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, chased turn, 6-path stretch, nothing left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 15000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, if for $3,750, allowed 2 lbs.(Limited to 10 Starters) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed in advisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAVORITE CHANNEL was unhurried early, a factor on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. MIZZ GEMMA was off the pace, moved up on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up for place. LADY OF THE FORT was in touch and raced evenly on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch needed more. RUMOURS FLY was in range and saved ground on the far turn but had no rally. PRINCESS DIDI was well back, closed the gap on the far turn and passed tired foes through the stretch. IMPOSSIBLE BERTIE set the pace and had the lead on the far turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and was empty. NAVY BLUE ANGEL stalked the early leader but lost ground on the far turn and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Didi
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap far turn, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Mizz Gemma
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, moved up far turn, 4-path stretch, up fore place

ENTRY.NAME: Lady of the Fort
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly far turn, 3-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Rumours Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, saved ground far turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Impossible Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led far turn, headed top stretch, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Favorite Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Blue Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, lost ground far turn, nothing left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAMAICAN JIMMY tracked the early leaders, was a factor on the turn and from the five path at the op of the stretch fought gamely for the win. SUPREMEACTION settled off the pace, moved up on the turn and from the eight path at the top of the stretch finished well. NAVAL OFFICER set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch held show. BEND IN THE RIVER was in range and roused on the turn but from the seven path at the top of the stretch was no real threat. STRONG ATTITUDE was hustled early but lost ground on the turn and had no impact. SAME AGAIN DOC was off the pace and showed little while never a threat. RICKI TORNADO was in mid pack but chased on the turn and dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, lost ground turn, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Naval Officer
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Ricki Tornado
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, chased turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bend in the River
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, 7-path stretch, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Supremeaction
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, moved up turn, 8-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Jimmy
ENTRY.OWNER: Vonkalckreuth Bart Alexander Langelaan Casey F Blair Guy Robert Fournier Mark Le
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, factor turn, 5-path stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Same Again Doc
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, never a threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not C onsidered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BROWN BREWSKII was unhurried early, had a mild gain on the turn and from the seven path at then top of the stretch was up in time. ARTIE'S ALL IN received an unfair start and was refunded. SANTIAGO SALSA was away alertly and a factor on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. MISS D'S PRIDE stalked the early leader and forced the pace on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was all out. WAR DOCTOR was hustled early and had a slim lead on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch had nothing left. IRIE ISLAND MAN was well back, showed nothing and was never in contention. A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE START RESULTED IN ARTIE'S ALL IN HAVING AN UNFAIR START AND WAS REFUNDED.

ENTRY.NAME: War Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, 4-path stretch, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Miss D's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, forced pace turn, 5-path stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Irie Island Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed nothing, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Artie's All In
ENTRY.COMMENT: unfair start, refund

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brown Brewskii
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild gain turn, 7-path stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Santiago Salsa
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, 6-path stretch, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 84. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Maiden Or Claiming Since July 28 Allowed 2 lbs. (Limited To 8 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders A wards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUSICAL RIDE was up close, raced evenly from the inside on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch drew clear. STORMING LADY was off the pace, had a mild gain on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch was up for place. SPARKLE SAMMY was away alertly and forced the pace on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch gave way. FOREST B was in mid pack and roused on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch needed more. BLACK TAFFY was in range and saved ground on the turn but was no real threat. GREEN GABLES was well back and moved up on the turn but from the eight path at the top of the stretch was not a factor. SILVER TUNES was hustled early and had a slim lead on the turn but came up empty. SILENT GUROO stalked the leaders from the outside and was a factor on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch failed to fire.

ENTRY.NAME: Black Taffy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, saved ground turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, evenly inside turn, 4-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Green Gables
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, moved up turn, 8-path stretch, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Forest B
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, roused turn, 6-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle Sammy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, 3-path stretch, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Guroo
ENTRY.OWNER: Voyce Robyn Voyce Casey Grant and Athoe Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, factor turn, 5-path stretch, failed to fire

ENTRY.NAME: Storming Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, 7-path stretch, up for place
